name: Half-Life 2D (Fan Game)
description:
This is a 2d fan game of the half-life games

This game campaing Will be divided in to chapters

Chapter 1 :

Its my take on Half-life 2 story on EP1 

sadly you are not freeman infact you are a combine member on your way evacuating the citadel of citty 17 after it's core explotion 

The game is not finished yet more levels and features Will be added

Features :

  • Working level editor for creating misions or campaing
  • NPCs Will fight at eachother depending their teams
  • Mini campaing
  • Modable game files (more to be added)

Notice I dont own any of the sound assets of the game and Im not affiliated with Valve in any sorts
